Name: Chanteloup Champagne Flip
Ingredients: 5 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: SHAKE first 7 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.
Review: Complex and dry with faint rich raisiny sherry and floral notes.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Chris Pawar at The Luggage Room Bar, London, England. Chris’ original recipe calls for Martell Cordon Bleu cognac.
Garnish: Mint sprig tip & dust with freshly grated nutmeg
